official_title: The Impact of Low Pressure Pneumoperitoneum in Robotic Assisted Radical Prostatectomy: A Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial II
inclusion_criteria:
- Male 40 years of age or older

* Diagnosis of prostate cancer
* Have been evaluated to be fit for proposed surgery
* Patients able to consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 40 Years
exclusion_criteria:
- Patients unable to consent (cognitively impaired)
